SEARCH
Module LabAssignment
Package control

Class AccountCreationController

java.lang.Object
control.AccountCreationController
public class AccountCreationController extends Object
Controller responsible for managing the lifecycle of user account creation. This includes registering new Company Representatives, handling the approval workflow (approve/reject) for those representatives, and general user authentication.

  • Constructor Details

    • AccountCreationController

      public AccountCreationController(AccountCreationRepository repository)
      Constructs a new AccountCreationController.
      Parameters:

  • Method Details

    • registerCompanyRep

      public CompanyRep registerCompanyRep(String email, String name, String password, String companyName, String department, String position)
      Registers a new Company Representative account. The account is created with a status requiring approval before they can log in.
      Parameters:
      email - The email address of the representative (must be unique and valid format).
      name - The full name of the representative.
      password - The login password.
      companyName - The name of the company the representative belongs to.
      department - The department within the company.
      position - The job title/position of the representative.
      Returns:
      The newly created CompanyRep object.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the email format is invalid, email exists, or company name is missing.

    • approveCompanyRep

      public CompanyRep approveCompanyRep(String repId)
      Approves a pending Company Representative, authorizing them to access the system.
      Parameters:
      repId - The unique identifier (email) of the representative to approve.
      Returns:
      The updated CompanyRep object with authorized status set to true.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the user is not found or is not a Company Representative.

    • rejectCompanyRep

      public void rejectCompanyRep(String repId)
      Rejects a pending Company Representative application and deletes the record.
      Parameters:
      repId - The unique identifier (email) of the representative to reject.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the user is not found or is not a Company Representative.

    • getPendingCompanyReps

      public List<CompanyRep> getPendingCompanyReps()
      Retrieves a list of all Company Representatives who are currently pending approval.
      Returns:
      A list of pending CompanyRep objects.

    • getAllUsers

      public List<User> getAllUsers()
      Retrieves all users currently registered in the system.
      Returns:
      A list of all User objects.

    • getUserById

      public User getUserById(String userId)
      Retrieves a specific user by their unique identifier.
      Parameters:
      userId - The unique identifier (email) of the user.
      Returns:
      The User object if found.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the user does not exist.

    • canUserLogin

      public boolean canUserLogin(String userId, String password)
      Verifies user credentials for login.
      Parameters:
      userId - The user's identifier (email).
      password - The password to verify.
      Returns:
      true if the user exists and the password matches; false otherwise.
